thread.section_title: OnDeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OnDeck | ondeck.com
thread.title: Scott. Beaverton, OR
thread.title_full: OnDeck reviewed by Scott. Beaverton, OR

author: Scott. Beaverton, OR
title: Scott. Beaverton, OR
text: Unlike all the other business capital companies, On Deck is totally honest and upfront with all the fine print. James Baldo is my loan rep, and was very nice and patient with all my questions and concerns. He did not try to push me into borrowing more than I can afford. I highly recommend On Deck and especially James Baldo Loan Rep.
